code: @Test public void testMocksAreValid() throws Exception {     // lets add more expectations     expectedEndpoint.expectedMessageCount(1).     expectedEndpoint.message(0).header("JMSXGroupID").isEqualTo("ABC").     MockEndpoint.assertIsSatisfied(camelContext).     // lets dump the received messages     List<Exchange> list = expectedEndpoint.getReceivedExchanges().     for (Exchange exchange : list) {         Object body = exchange.getIn().getBody().         LOG.debug("Received: body: " + body + " of type: " + ObjectHelper.className(body) + " on: " + exchange).     } }
